explanation: [0-0] On a go-kart track, a pink go-kart is heading towards a jar of pickles placed on a red cone, with the words "The BRAKE Challenge" displayed at the top of the screen.

[0-6] The pink go-kart continues towards the pickles, ready to take on the challenge, getting closer and closer, the driver wearing a helmet, a yellow arrow pointing at the pickle jar, the word "Gherkis" written below. The go-kart brakes sharply in front of the pickles, and the inertia from the sudden braking sends the pickle jar flying, falling to the ground. Another camera angle repeats the scene of the go-kart knocking over the pickle jar.
